phrase.item: There is a knight on the other [river] bank.
I found someone just like you,
and your heart also has been appeased.
A bronze hammer.
Autumn has arrived,
The son has separated from his mother.
High (tall) doors.
Your stature is beautiful,
Your stature pleases me, son of mir (regional chief)
You are wearing a jacket.
If I am searching for someone big (great),
It is the son of the mir (regional chief)
A light breeze on the slope of the mountain.
‎‎Do not sigh heavily,
A heavy sigh is a sign of chagrin (sadness).
The partridge is in the saxaul.
Do not throw any sticks at him,
My brother is coming.
Your little pearls are hail.
Let he who descends to the village
Tell to his mom that his daughter is bored.
Little pearls, it is hail.
What's the final a?
Wait a bit,
Your sister will complain to you.
You are wearing boots.
Where is my soldier?
My soldier is in Moscow.
On your skewer a piece of grilled meat.
They call you the igniter,
And the igniter provokes sufferings.
The light from the moon on the floor of your house.
Every time that I remember you,
The chagrin makes me the same as a black coal.
A tree's shadow over your cottage.
I transform you into a match,
I envelop you in paper.
Tie your turban.
Get on your horse,
This makes you much more beautiful.
I want to take the one hundred steps along your aryk. (small aqueduct supporting agriculture and providing water)
Oh, if I could transform myself into a partridge,
I would slide onto your bosom.
Shimmering seashell.
Oh, if youth were here,
but youth only flourishes just once.
Lichen like freckles.
People arrived from the hamlet,
They said: your work is not successful.
You have on your head an embroidered cap.
What will I see of you?
It is my happiness and my destiny.
Snow crystals like eyelashes.
I will make you an amulet,
For the amulet you will have two pairs of pearls.
The apples ripened in the garden.
When I stroll in the garden,
in the mountains and in the valley autumn has arrived.
I climbed to a peak.
Conifer branches are drying on the roof or your house.
The river is flooding.
A cup of fresh liquid cream.
You have a good rifle.
A shawl on the shoulders.
You are wearing a dress.
A ring of silver and gold.
The gentle sun sets on this abandonned terrain (field).
A flower, a basil flower.
An orache (mountain spinach) in a field.
A sparkling moon.
A bundle of small roots.
Daisies like pumpkins,
Weather without clouds.
A yellow tent.
A poplar in front of your door.
A strong passion.
The sun glistens on a stone.
Amber and its fragrances.
Cold and cloudy weather.
A golden braid (mat?).
Your livestock (flock) is on a slope.
A freckle like a flower.
Yellow embroidery on some indian [cotton fabric].
Gold on the steppes (across the desert).
Your book is beautifully written.
Leave your opium.
A large ring.
Your eyebrows are like a [female] duck's feather.
A round-handled knife (dagger).
A [female] duck is swimming (swims).
A colorful bag.
Stars sparkle.
Yellow fabric.
Quatrains
If we must appreciate (value) each other,
Let it be in this world, in this world.
After death even if you lacerate yourself
all is vain, all is vain.
When the apricot will reach maturity,
give it the time to ripen, give it the time to ripen.
If your children do not stay with you ,
let them go (leave), let them go (leave),
My son is in Kokand.
In Kokand he has children.
He does not need the Wakhan (homeland).
My son is in Badjin (Peking/Beijing).
He has traveled across China and Mochin (name of an enchanted country).
He has ingots in his sac.
My son is on a faraway river
My son is the sound of a mountain torrent.
My son is the rustling (splashing) of water from a canal.
My son is celestial rains.
My son is a mointain eagle.
My son is the grape from the garden.
A chick (baby bird), a birdie on a stone.
You will see a beaver, bend over.
You will see a kalandar (qalandar?), have fun.
Arc (head), arc (head), go to sleep!
Wait, grandmother, I'm warming myself [up] a bit.
You bivouac on the sarssines (elevated area where "sarss" (tarragon) grows).
You have golden binoculars in your hands.
When you will leave [here], look at me.
You wear a variegated (patched) garment.
What does my gentle Gim desire?
Send me some news.
You wear a garment of alatcha (?).
I have no solution.
My heart has exploded.
You have (wear) a shawl on your head.
A thousand thoughts about your gentle [person].
Spend this night with me.
Near your door, a small pumpkin (squash).
Gentle [woman], do not cheat me.
Call me one time (once).
I watered the beans.
nNoukra has left from the house.
She kissed my cheek.
I steered the water towards the high canal.
I remembered Noukra.
My heart is taken [away] by the wind.
You have boots on your feet.
A lizard looks (glances) at you sideways.
A stick will penetrate you.
My half-brother Navrouz.
We have gone to gather wood with him.
He kicked the female yak.
